homeHeader.title: From Licences to Leads — Grow, Hire, and Sell Across the UAE with One All-in-One Dual License Solution
homeHeader.description: Frustrated by endless paperwork, unclear approvals, and invisible free-zone restrictions that stop you from selling onshore? At One Nexuz, our business specialists handle all the eligibility checks, DED/ADRA filings, and government back-and-forth to help you tap into 2B+ customers in 40+ Free Zones and the Mainland market — all without the stress of forming multiple companies or branches. Secure your UAE dual business license to expand your customer reach, bid for high-value government contracts, and drive business revenue!

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is a dual license in the UAE?
items.answer: A dual license allows your company to operate in both the UAE Free Zone and on the Mainland, empowering you with the flexibility to serve local clients and bid for government contracts while enjoying the benefits of a Free Zone company.

items.question: Who is eligible for a dual license?
items.answer: Most Free Zone companies with eligible activities can apply for a dual license, though approval depends on the specific Free Zone and Mainland authority. Our experts ensure your eligibility and guide you through every step of the process.

items.question: How long does it take to get a dual license?
items.answer: You can secure your dual license in 7-14 working days, depending on your selected jurisdiction, your selected business activities, and document readiness.

items.question: Do I need a physical office to secure my UAE dual license?
items.answer: Depending on your business activity and mainland regulations, a physical office may be required. Our specialists help you determine the optimal setup to minimize costs without risking compliance.

items.question: Will a dual license affect my Free Zone benefits?
items.answer: No, your Free Zone advantages, from full foreign ownership and tax exemptions to export/import flexibility, remain 100% intact while you gain legal access to the Mainland market.
